    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v0

    ValueWithAttributes Email

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v0:String
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v0:Email

      • Description

        Electronic email addresses, in IETF specified format.
        Additional Documentation 
        Type Value
        Implementers Assigned XSD Type: {http://chameleon.anonymous/ns}StringLength1to128

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Email defaultInd="true" emailType="2" optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00" remark="Example String Value" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No" textFormat="I am a short string." validInd="true" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v0">I am a medium string.</Email>

      Example JSON

      {
  "Email" : {
    "value" : "I am a medium string.",
    "emailType" : "2",
    "remark" : "Example String Value",
    "textFormat" : "I am a short string.",
    "shareMarketInd" : "Yes",
    "shareSyncInd" : "No",
    "optInStatus" : "OptedIn",
    "optInDate" : "2011-01-24T09:45:00",
    "optOutDate" : "2011-07-04T14:15:00",
    "validInd" : true,
    "defaultInd" : true
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        emailType
        Defines the purpose of the e-mail address (e.g. personal, business, listserve). Refer to OpenTravel Code List Email Address Type (EAT).
        Details
        Type http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v0:Code_OTA
        Example Value 2
        Required false
        Pattern [0-9A-Z]{1,4}(\.[A-Z]{3}(\.X){0,1}){0,1}
        Max Occurrences 1
        remark
        A remark associated with the e-mail address.
        Details
        Type http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v0:String_Text
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        textFormat
        Example: text/plain
        Details
        Type http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v0:String_Short
        Example Value I am a short string.
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        privacy  
        Details
        Type http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v0:Privacy
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        validInd
        If true, this is a valid email address that has been system verified via a successful email transmission.
        defaultInd
        If true, this identifies this is the default email address.
